context: Why does it have a Teen rating vs. Mature?
response: There is no sexual content besides cleavage. And the gore is kept to a minimum during and after combat.

context: Is this a US based product?   Last DS I bought from Amazon came from China and I had lots of problems with it
response: Most US based companies that produce electronics work out of China   but the product seems to work fine

context: Does it come with a mounting bracket for the tv?  How does it sit on top of the tv, if no bracket is included?
response: Additional information...HCC said on February 20, 2015Thank you for answering.You're welcome, we normally sit the camera on top of our tv or in front of the tv on our amoire. As long as the surface it flat, it works well.

context: Is White 2 and Black 2 the same game? I'm confused because they have the exact same number of reviews and I don't know which to get my daughter.
response: Yes and no. They're different versions of the same exact game. They each have some minor, version exclusive content that the other game does not. This is to encourage player interaction and sharing. But you are not missing out on anything if you get one version and not the other.

context: Does it work with all Call of Duty games?
response: No. This only works on Call of Duty 3 on Nintendo Wii.

context: what is the difference between titanium for 27.99 and the other one for 19.99? and can we download this on to our android tablet
response: Titanium Edition Has an extra map and farming equepments. Farming Simulator 2013 only for MAC and PC. For Android You can get Farming Simulator 14

context: does this promote weight loss
response: I have been doing Zumba for a couple of months and while I have not lost weight, I have lost inches!  That's even better because it means I am losing fat and gaining muscle. It is a great workout.  You really burn calories and because it's so much fun it's not a chore.

context: Does this fit with the phone, when it has a case on?
response: Yes, I have the Galaxy lll w/ an Otter Box case and the fit is fine

context: Is this a FPS game?
response: yes its a first player so you run around and kill zombies while making new friends

context: Will this fit my 12 year old son?
response: Of course it can! My 12 year old cousin got it and it fits him perfectly. Plus it's adjustable for any sized head

context: This cable works without having a battery? I mean, It will charge my controller without a battery inside?
response: it won't charge it without a battery, but you can keep it plugged in and use the controller without batteries it just has to remain plugged in the whole time.

context: how much space is required
response: 5.3GB HDD space. Hope it helps :)

context: Is this game compatible with a United States model 1 PS3?
response: It worked on my US PS3. The only problem I had with the game was that everything is in Japanese and there is no English translation unless you go online and search for it. The game is awesomeeee though!

context: is this Kinect compatible
response: Yes, it will connect with no problem.

context: So when you charge the gamepad this charges with it? You don't need to charge them seperatly right?
response: yes one charge. my only complaint is after almost a year I need to buy another the battery simply does not hold a charge any longer

context: Can i play these on a mac?
response: As far as I know, you can't. However, you may be able to find it on line, just make sure to look for the Mac symbol.Hope this helps,Eric

context: Is the co-op mode splitscreen?
response: I played with a group of four, two on my screen at my house and two remote.  It was an awesome game, very fast paced.

context: Can you change it to American or is it only in japanese?
response: It can do all languages.  The main distinction is on the Vita menus, the X and O buttons do the opposite.  It will say press O to enter and X to close.  In most games it's back to non Japanese designations.  I found it easy to get over, but others don't like it.

context: can this be used with the xbox one
response: Yes it does but DO NOT waste your money on this peice of TRASH trust me

context: Does it come with Dragonball Z Boudkai Tenakichi 3?!!!!!!!!
response: Some sellers sell them with games and some don't so you will need to look at the condition notes.

context: would it work on a non hdmi tv?
response: Yes, as long as your TV has component input (red, blue, and green for video + red and white for audio) or composite input (yellow for video + red and white for sound). The component input is generally a higher quality.

context: ZSNES/NES/N64 Emulator Compatibility Can anyone who has used this with old gen system emulators post about their experience using this with those progs?
response: Haven't tested the others, but it works with ZSNES except you can't go to and through Settings of the actual emulator with it (Don't know if you can with any other controller either however).

context: Does the throttle work on it's own, since I'll be using a different stick?Thanks in advance.
response: If it is pulled all the way back it will not work.

context: is it split screen
response: Not sure if that option is available. When I saw my grandson playing is was only one screen

context: Will this still work with Windows 7?
response: Yes it will work with Win 7.  Plenty of people still play Sims 1 with Win 7, and I haven't heard anything about any installation problems.  If you run into any, try installing it as an administrator.

context: could i use the warranty if i take this to america latina?
response: Course! But they haven't authorized partners there, so you must send it to US or Europe to fix. Anyway, the T500RS is the best for your pocket.

context: Does this software require an always on internet connection?
response: No, Reader Rabbit does not require any internet connection for product use. You will need to leave the disc in the drive to run the program. Product registration may be done online.

context: why wont the LED lights work? and/or the software show a setting for it?
response: I'm not sure. When I received mine, I had to download the Steel Series Engine from their website.  http://steelseries.com/engine  Then all the settings I could ever want were on there. That website has an animation of how to use the software as well so if it doesnt look/work like that, something is wrong.
